docs.snippet: With the Big East realigning and Notre Dame bound for the Atlantic Coast Conference, the top-seeded Fighting Irish beat Connecticut for their first conference crown since 1994....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the Big East realigning and Notre Dame bound for the Atlantic Coast Conference, the top-seeded Fighting Irish beat Connecticut for their first conference crown since 1994.
docs.abstract: Notre Dame women's basketball team beats Connecticut, 61-59, to win Big East Conference title.

headline.seo: Notre Dame Gets Big East Title on Last Try
headline.main: Notre Dame Exits With a Title

docs.snippet: St. Louis (24-6) won the Atlantic 10 regular-season title while dealing with the death of its former coach Rick Majerus....
docs.lead_paragraph: St. Louis (24-6) won the Atlantic 10 regular-season title while dealing with the death of its former coach Rick Majerus.
docs.abstract: St Louis men's basketball team says their Atlantic 10 regular-season title is a tribute to their former coach Rick Majerus, who died of heart failure in December 2012, and what he taught them.

headline.seo: Billikens’ Conference Title Is Tribute to What Majerus Taught Them
headline.main: Billikens’ Title Is Tribute to What Majerus Taught Them

docs.snippet: There is winning and then there is covering the point spread, an important distinction for sports gamblers, who are forecast to wager billions this month during the N.C.A.A. tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: There is winning and then there is covering the point spread, an important distinction for sports gamblers, who are forecast to wager billions this month during the N.C.A.A. tournament.
docs.abstract: Sports gamblers, who are forecast to wager billions this month during the NCAA basketball tournament, are more concerned with point spreads than with actual game scores.

headline.seo: Gamblers Bemoan the Closing Seconds of Iona Game

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON — Mary Jo White moved closer to becoming a top Wall Street regulator on Tuesday as she sailed through a Congressional confirmation hearing. But even her supporters on Capitol Hill pointed to significant challenges awaiting the ne...
docs.lead_paragraph:
WASHINGTON — Mary Jo White moved closer to becoming a top Wall Street regulator on Tuesday as she sailed through a Congressional confirmation hearing. But even her supporters on Capitol Hill pointed to significant challenges awaiting the next leader of the Securities and Exchange Commission.
 
While she received a friendly reception during two hours of testimony, the Senate Banking Committee grilled Ms. White, the nominee for S.E.C. chairwoman, on her regulatory agenda, demanding that Ms. White complete new rules for Wall Street and take aim at financial fraud. Lawmakers argued that the agency, four years after the financial crisis, must confront a broad array of problems facing the public markets.
docs.abstract: Mary Jo White vows at Senate Banking Committee hearing to tackle enforcement and unfinished regulation, but offers few details on her plans as head of Securities and Exchange Commission; White's nomination is expected to be approved. Photo (M)/

headline.main: At Hearing, Nominee for S.E.C. Chief Vows to Be a Tough Wall St. Regulator

docs.snippet: Some older adults are taking jobs that they never trained for as young people, like recording audiobooks, refereeing sports and bartending....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some older adults are taking jobs that they never trained for as young people, like recording audiobooks, refereeing sports and bartending.
docs.abstract: Robert Strauss Essay observes that some older adults are taking jobs that they never trained for as young people, like recording audiobooks, refereeing sports and bartending; points out many, like himself, are testing them out before they leave what they have done for decades.

headline.seo: Older Adults Start New Chapters in Their Work Lives
headline.main: What Do You Want to Be, Now That You’re Grown?
headline.print_headline: What Do You Want to Be, Now That You’re Grown?
